name: LearntoCount
0:
”Alexa, open learn counting”
”Alexa, start learn counting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn counting
des:
A fun and interesting skill that will support your kid in their early year to learn to count. Ask Alexa to start learn to count and choose between three modes: easy, medium or hard. 
Each are designed to help your kids progress in learning to count. 
Easy mode is a simple repeat of the number.
Medium mode requires a response with the next number. 
Hard mode is the same as medium but misses out some numbers along the way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
